metadata.name: AWG Series
metadata.description: Comprehensive SCPI commands for AWG70000, AWG5200 series, and all plugins

manualReferences.title: LVDS Video Signals Plug-in Application Programmer Manual
High Speed Serial Application Plug-in Programmer Manual
OFDM Signal Modulation Plug-in Programmer Manual
RF Generic Signals Plug-in Programmer Manual

commands.name: Set Filter Type
commands.description: Set filter type for signal path (requires Option AC)

commands.name: Set Band Pass Filter Range
commands.description: Set band pass filter frequency range

commands.name: Set Attenuator A1
commands.description: Set A1 attenuator value in dB (Band Pass Filter path)

commands.name: Set Attenuator A2
commands.description: Set A2 attenuator value in dB (Band Pass Filter path)

commands.name: Set Attenuator A3
commands.description: Set A3 attenuator value in dB (Band Pass Filter path)

commands.name: Set DAC Power Level
commands.description: Set DAC output power level in dBm (AC output mode)

commands.name: Set Stopped Value Marker
commands.description: Set marker output condition when stopped

commands.name: Set Waiting Value Analog
commands.description: Set output condition when waiting for trigger

commands.name: Set Waiting Value Marker
commands.description: Set marker output condition when waiting for trigger

commands.name: Query Waveform Count
commands.description: Query number of waveforms in memory

commands.name: Create New Waveform
commands.description: Create a new waveform in memory

commands.name: Assign Waveform to Channel
commands.description: Assign a waveform to output channel

commands.name: Set External Clock Divider
commands.description: Set external clock divider rate (power of 2)

commands.name: Set External Clock Frequency
commands.description: Set expected external clock frequency (6.25-12.5 GHz)

commands.name: Adjust External Clock
commands.description: Calibrate system clock circuitry for external clock

commands.name: Detect External Clock Frequency
commands.description: Auto-detect and configure external clock frequency

commands.name: Set External Reference Frequency
commands.description: Set expected external reference frequency (35-250 MHz)

commands.name: Set Clock Phase Degrees
commands.description: Set clock phase adjustment in degrees (-10800 to 10800)

commands.name: Set Clock Phase Time
commands.description: Set clock phase adjustment in picoseconds

commands.name: Set Sequence Step Waveform
commands.description: Set waveform for a sequence step

commands.name: Set Sequence Step Loop Count
commands.description: Set repeat count for sequence step

commands.name: Set Sequence Step Goto
commands.description: Set goto target for sequence step

commands.name: Set Operation Complete
commands.description: Set OPC bit when operations complete

commands.name: Wait
commands.description: Wait for pending operations to complete

commands.name: Query Error
commands.description: Query and clear one error from queue

commands.name: Query Error Count
commands.description: Query number of errors in queue

commands.name: Abort Calibration
commands.description: Stop calibration and restore previous constants

commands.name: Query Calibration Catalog
commands.description: List calibration subsystems, areas, or procedures

commands.name: Compile Pulse Waveform
commands.description: Compile and generate waveforms/sequences based on pulse setup

commands.name: Set Pulse Compile and Assign
commands.description: Set compilation type (compile only or compile and assign)

commands.name: Set Pulse Oversampling
commands.description: Set oversampling rate for pulse compilation (1-1000)

commands.name: Set Pulse Overwrite Mode
commands.description: Enable/disable overwriting existing waveforms during compilation

commands.name: Set Pulse Sample Rate
commands.description: Set sampling rate for pulse compilation

commands.name: Add Pulse Frame
commands.description: Add new frame to current pulse train

commands.name: Query Pulse Frame Count
commands.description: Query number of pulse definitions in current pulse train

commands.name: Delete Pulse Frame
commands.description: Delete pulse definition at specified index (1-100)

commands.name: Set Pulse Frame Dead Time
commands.description: Set dead time for current frame (0-1 seconds)

commands.name: Set Pulse Frame Number of Pulses
commands.description: Set number of pulses in current frame (1-10000)

commands.name: Select Pulse Frame
commands.description: Select pulse definition index for editing (1-100)

commands.name: Set Pulse Fall Time Value
commands.description: Set fall time value for pulse

commands.name: Set Pulse Off Time
commands.description: Set off time value for frame (0-1 seconds)

commands.name: Set Pulse Repeat Frequency
commands.description: Set pulse repeat frequency for frame

commands.name: Set Pulse Repeat Interval
commands.description: Set pulse repeat interval for frame

commands.name: Set Pulse Rise Time Value
commands.description: Set rise time value for pulse

commands.name: Add Pulse Train
commands.description: Create and add pulse train to list (max 10 trains)

commands.name: Set Pulse Train Channel
commands.description: Set channel for pulse train waveform/sequence

commands.name: Query Pulse Train Count
commands.description: Query number of pulse trains in list

commands.name: Delete Pulse Train
commands.description: Delete specified pulse train from list

commands.name: Reset Pulse Plugin
commands.description: Reset pulse plug-in to default values

Video_Plugin.description: LVDS Video Signal plug-in for video waveform generation

commands.name: Compile Video Waveform
commands.description: Compile and generate LVDS video waveforms

commands.name: Set Video Waveform Name
commands.description: Set name for compiled video waveform

commands.name: Set Video Sample Rate
commands.description: Set sampling rate for video compilation

commands.name: Set Video Export File
commands.description: Set export file path for image data

commands.name: Set Video Color Bits
commands.description: Set encoding color bits (6, 8, or 10 bit)

commands.name: Reset Video Plugin
commands.description: Reset LVDS video plugin to defaults

commands.name: Set Video High Voltage
commands.description: Set high voltage level for LVDS

commands.name: Set Video Low Voltage
commands.description: Set low voltage level for LVDS

High_Speed_Serial.description: High-speed serial data signal generation and impairments

commands.name: Activate High Speed Serial Plugin
commands.description: Activate the High Speed Serial plugin

commands.name: Set HSS Data Rate
commands.description: Set data rate for high-speed serial signal

Radar_Signals.description: Radar signal generation with pulse modulation and impairments

commands.name: Reset Radar Plugin
commands.description: Reset Radar plugin to default values

OFDM_Modulation.description: OFDM signal modulation for wireless communications

RF_Generic.description: Generic RF signal generation and modulation

commands.name: Activate RF Generic Plugin
commands.description: Activate the RF Generic Signals plugin

commands.name: Reset RF Generic Plugin
commands.description: Reset RF Generic plugin to defaults

Optical_Signals.description: Optical signal generation for fiber optic testing

commands.name: Reset Optical Plugin
commands.description: Reset Optical Signals plugin to defaults

Multitone.description: Multi-tone signal generation for interference testing
